pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, December 20, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, December 20, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Foyer
House of Commons

Note for media:

  • Open coverage 

Media appearances

  • An interview with the Prime Minister and Pierre Bruneau will air at 8:30 p.m. on LCN.
